name: Prince of Persia: Rival Swords
description:
Your homeland is besieged. Your people are enslaved. Now, you must use
the Wii controllers to wield an array of ancient weapons and bring peace
to your shattered land. You've never played Prince of Persia quite like
this.

Features

• Each of your hands controls an awe-inspiring weapon
• Use the
Nunchuk to carve the deadly Daggertail through your enemy's flesh
•
Devastate your enemies with stealthy Speed Kills by timing your
controller movement
• Outsmart the opposition in pulse-quickening
chariot races
